articles.author: Matthew Burgess
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for October 26 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian shares slumped and futures on the tech-heavy Nasdaq 100 index extended declines following a batch of poor corporate earnings. Currency traders were on edge after the yen weakened past a key level.
articles.content:
